projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A showcase of my recent work and personal projects

project1.title: E-Commerce Platform
project1.description: A modern e-commerce platform with a seamless shopping experience, featuring product filtering, cart management, and secure checkout.
project1.full_description: A comprehensive e-commerce solution built with React and Next.js. Features include advanced product filtering, real-time inventory updates, secure payment integration with Stripe, and a fully responsive design that works beautifully on all devices.

project2.title: Task Management App
project2.description: A beautiful task management application with drag-and-drop functionality, real-time collaboration, and progress tracking.
project2.full_description: A productivity-focused task management application featuring drag-and-drop task organization, team collaboration tools, project timelines, and detailed analytics. Built with React, TypeScript, and real-time updates using WebSockets.

project3.title: Portfolio Dashboard
project3.description: An interactive financial portfolio dashboard with real-time data visualization and performance analytics.
project3.full_description: A sophisticated financial dashboard showcasing investment portfolios with real-time market data, interactive D3.js charts, performance metrics, and customizable widgets. Features dark mode and responsive design.

project4.title: Social Media App
project4.description: A social media platform with modern UI, real-time messaging, and content sharing capabilities.
project4.full_description: A feature-rich social platform with real-time messaging, content feeds, user profiles, and media sharing. Built with React and Firebase, featuring optimistic updates and infinite scrolling.
